description:
Warm, weather-resistant tights to keep you moving through the winter months. Thick and warm fabric with a brushed interior seal in warmth on cold days, and water-resistant front panels shed light wind and rain.

  • Polyester main fabric has 4-way stretch for unrestricted movement
  • Front thigh panel has Rudolf Bionic Finish® ECO water-repellent finish
  • Ankle zips for easy on and off
  • Silicone gripper elastics on ankles hold tights securely in place
  • Flatlock seams throughout prevent chafing
name: Kari Traa Tirill Tights - Women's
